Package org.fcrepo.kernel.api.utils

Class RelaxedPropertiesHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fcrepo.kernel.api.utils.RelaxedPropertiesHelper
  • public class RelaxedPropertiesHelper
extends Object
    Some server managed triples can have the prohibition on user-management overridden. While the server still updates them implicitly, it may be possible in some cases for a user request to override them.
    Author:
    Mike Durbin, whikloj
